website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot SX400 IS is a no-frills camera with a 30x lens, but there are better cameras out there for the same price.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality with extended zoom-Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Way above expectations, I love this camera! I have already taken some wonderful pictures with it of wildlife in my area. I wanted a camera to take high quality pictures with extended zoom, without me putting a lot of thought into settings on the camera itself. If that is what you want from a camera, this is the one you have been looking for. Click or Mouse over the picture that I have included to see a larger version of it. I love the clarity of the subject itself and how the foreground and background are blurred. This picture was taken in the automatic setting using the Auto button, conveniently located on the back of the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harris

customer_reviews.title: Clear Picture!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I just got it in today and lucky me, I had a beautiful bright full moon! I took some photos and got some good shots. I really love this camera for the pictures, and if you fiddle around with the settings, you can get some nice photos! Its also nice to be able to zoom very far, because then you don't disturb the wildlife!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Moye

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I found the camera very easy to use. At first I was apprehensive because the LCD is a bit grainy and I thought maybe the pictures would look that bad. When I loaded the pictures onto my desktop and saw them in Corel Paintshop Pro X7 I was very happy. they looked great. The camera has many features which are very easy to use and get to. Other reviews think it's hard to get through the menus but it's not. Minus one star for the LCD display but otherwise a great camera for me. And a great price at 138 bucks. The SX410 just wasn't worth the extra 60 dollars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Loaded with automatic features
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Loaded with automatic features, and the flexibility to "go manual" if you like, the built in flash works well, and the lens quality is great a 28-210 MM wide angle to telephoto covers most needs for the amature photographer. Only downside is the Li-Ion battery (proprietary) made it difficult to ship (i'm deployed to Antarctica, so I had is shipped home, then re-shipped here to get around Amazon's policy of not shipping Li-ion batteries to APO addresses). It's capable of taking pics every 0.8 seconds, as well as shooting 30 FPS 780p HD video. A 32 GB memory card holds hundreds of images, and the manual says it gets around 200 images on one battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Zawacki

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 13 year old daughter. She wanted a better camera than her Samsung powershot. It definitely has a better stabilizer and takes clearer and brighter pictures. She is happy about that. Her other camera mostly took blurry photos. It is an older model so it doesn't have the extra features her other camera has. She doesn't care about that. I like the price and that it is a Canon. I have a Canon SLR camera which I love. I stand by Canon products. It is a great little camera for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: CajunRD

customer_reviews.title: Good Beginners Camera.
customer_reviews.text: We took a vacation to Alaska and was able to take fantastic shots of the natural beauty during the trip with this "point-and-shoot" Canon digital camera. Great zoom power for photos and easy to use, vivid colors. Acceptable to "almost" above average night photos, with proper adjustments of the ISO (set it to max 1600). Of course it will never beat a Digital SLR Camera (big price difference). Certainly a good beginners camera for those going outdoors not wanting to carry all the accessories that comes with a Digital SLR (lenses...). Looking forward to many more photo adventures with this camera!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GREAT CAMERS
customer_reviews.text: Just got home from Atlantic Beach, NC let me tell you one thing for sure this camera takes some amazing pictures... it pulls thing up close it is amazing... I love it and recommend you getting one, great camera, great price.... I would suggest getting a bigger than 2GB SD Card... LOL if you like me love to take pictures... and did I mention it is easy as can be to use.... all I can say is GET ONE....
customer_reviews.author: Louie Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Camera for the Money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter's birthday. We wanted a quality camera that would take good pictures. My daughter doesn't take a lot of pictures, but she enjoys it and she learning. The shutter speeds and video has been very useful. The slower shutter speeds to allow more light on the picture when it's darker. This feature has been very impressive and the pictures look great. I'm impressed with this camera and I think it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a 12 year old !
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars from Gram because I had to order the USB cord extra. 5 stars from my granddaughter, age 12.. She is having a ball with this camera. She's not the smartest kid, but she had no trouble learning to use the camera. Of course she loves the color. She's actually looking at whats out the window more often now and has taken hundreds of photos and videos since receiving the camera for Christmas. She takes if everywhere. I did order an extra battery so she could keep one charged. The price was great, as granddaughter is not the most careful kid in the world. Yes, I would buy it again if something happens to the one she has.
customer_reviews.author: Lots2Loosea

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that there was no instruction book
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that there was no instruction book. I would like to have the instructions with me when I am using the camera. Also the camera felt awkward in my hand and it was difficult to press the shoot button without shaking the camera, that might not be the case for someone else. The Zoom is great. The pictures are clear. So far I have only used it on auto and that is very easy. The fact that I don't have the instructions with me has kept me from using any of the other modes. I will need to practice at home to find out what they do.
customer_reviews.author: margi

customer_reviews.title: A great quality camera
customer_reviews.text: All my 10 year old wanted as a gift was this specific camera. She spent days on Amazon reviewing cameras and reviews. She then gave me the specs of this specific camera. When she received this asa gift she obviously was thrilled. She is a beginner photographer enthusiast and this is the absolute perfect camera to learn and explore with. Simple to use and understand but has advanced features for photography growth as she learns. The price point is great for a beginner who is entering the photography world but has the quality of a canon camera with great details.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures if you can hold it steady enough
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures if you can hold it steady enough, but it is a very small camera. Physically, i mean. It is tiny. I am a 6'2 guy an I have big hands, so I understand for a 5'3 woman with little hands it fits great. Just too small for me. I'll give it to my niece and buy something bigger
customer_reviews.author: jakewade

customer_reviews.title: A Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason this camera was discontinued. The focus for regular photos is off and the images are over-exposed. As it is fully automatic, it can't be altered. I bought it for a vacation and was extremely disappointed, I ended up used by cell phone instead,. I would not buy this and I would definitely not buy it from the seller, who took more than the two days promised to get back to me and suggested I go directly to Canon. This is the last time I buy a camera on line.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dickson

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for simple pictures, this will work.
customer_reviews.text: I say I'm pretty happy with it, but I say 3 stars for what someone else might get out it, I think the battery should recharge when you plug the USB in. Instead you have to take the battery out, put in the charger(which does come with it an is fairly easy to use).
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Really great camera with a great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Really great camera with a great battery life. However, if you are purchasing it in hopes of getting the next best pro camera (and not paying a mortgage payment for it), it does not compare. The lighting and landscape settings are a bit confusing to use and unfortunately I experimented while traveling. Therefore, some of my pictures are not the best quality. However, I don't regret this purchase, as it is still a great camera, just not user friendly for someone who doesn't want to test and practice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I can say is I love it!  This photo I joke saying first time Buddy (my dog) and I saw eye to eye
customer_reviews.text: For my first big girl camera lol I really like it a lot. It was pretty easy to figure out. I have been kind of surprised by some of the great easy shots I have gotten.I can't think of anything half way bad to say about it!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Soward

customer_reviews.title: Great For Moon Shots!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera about 2 years ago to start off a beginning path to photography and it still works like new to this day! Unlike my iPhone's camera, this Canon camera goes a little above and beyond with photo taking if you are a beginner. I mainly used this to catch shots of full moons in the area.
customer_reviews.author: Serafin

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any beginner or someone who just wants a simple camera to take nice HD photos with. It's tiny, but then again I have tiny hands so it works out perfectly. :) People are always amazed with the price I bought it for since it looks expensive. ^^
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight
customer_reviews.text: Have trouble figuring out why some pictures are not in focus, but it is probably operator error. Nice light weight. I love the grip on the side to hold the camera. It does take good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: KKaren

customer_reviews.title: Memory card error
customer_reviews.text: Solid Material and good button but It were not able to pick up the memory card due to which I was not able to take the photos for the function which it was bought for.
customer_reviews.author: Amaon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera! The zoom is amazing. Low light pictures could look better though.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the camera. I am really noob at cameras, but I love the huge zoom this camera has. I haven't figured out how to take pictures at night though. Pictures during the day are gorgeous but I can't get a good picture during the night. The size and the grip are another interesting thing about this Canon PowerShot
customer_reviews.author: Juarez Aires Sampaio Filho

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy not good!
customer_reviews.text: This CAMERA IS NOT WHAT YOU THINK IT IS, I compared pictures taken with my phone sent to a friend n he thought the phone pics were from the camera. Poor quality, screen is small, and You're wasting your money if You buy this! Also you wont get any shipping fee back they will deduct supposedly 5.74 when You return, but your refund will way less then what you paid for
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Perez

customer_reviews.title: low battery warning too late and I would have preferred a manual written by someone with a better command of the English languag
customer_reviews.text: Rubber connection cover won't stay closed, inadequate battery life, low battery warning too late and I would have preferred a manual written by someone with a better command of the English language as some of the instructions are difficult to understand or simply don't work the way the manual says. The older, AA battery version of this camera was better, too bad I lost it.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Gouk

customer_reviews.title: but what a great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought used, but what a great little camera! Truthfully represented by seller, camera is like new. Turns on instantly, easy on batteries and takes great photos. My old Coolpix took so long to "boot up" that I'd often miss the shot. This camera is a delight.
customer_reviews.author: Handy guy

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a great buy. It was cheap (around $100 I believe) and was for my mother for her birthday, since she used her 4 year old smartphone for pictures. The camera is small and light weight, and is easy to use, which is great since my mother is very technology illiterate. I am very pleased with this product, and while it's no $2300 professional camera, it can still deliver what people need from it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Schade

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I purchased it for
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera. It's not as good as a DSLR but I got it for product photos for my home business. It does the job. I would recommend downloading the owner's manual so you can learn all the inner workings of the camera. The menu can be a little tricky but with the owner's manual, you can be a professional at the settings in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth BrothersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: High quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our trip to Hawaii and were very impressed at how high quality the photos turned out. The only two negatives are that you have to manually remove the lens cap and that it doesn't come with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, instructions could be more detailed.
customer_reviews.text: Takes excellent pictures but the instructions seem incomplete. The ad said "obsolete" but new cameras in the store look just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gen 3 Camaro

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera because of the very powerful zoom
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera because of the very powerful zoom. I am not patient enough to learn fancier cameras. This one allows me to take very good pictures of the kids from long distances. I am not a photographer, but for the average person who wants to quickly take good pictures, I think this is a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Camera Happy High Schoolers!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Was a great addition to for our school journalism staff. Literally, a click and shoot camera with the sleek digital camera options. Quality photographs for amateur users! Make sure you either have a sim card or purchase one with the camera; otherwise, you will have to wait to use your camera.
customer_reviews.author: Leila L. Canady

customer_reviews.title: Great gift or beginning camera users
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me 14 year-old granddaughter and she has used it a lot and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Overall, awesome...but videos stink!
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot smaller than I thought it would be, but overall it works pretty great. The zoom is AMAZING, but the video quality stinks.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera, except...
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, EXCEPT I wish I could adjust my shutter speed and aperture. I wish I had known these functions weren't available. I got this camera for class, and now I have to buy a new one. It's perfect for getting high quality photos otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing little camera. Not small enough to fit in your pocket because of the awesome telephoto capability but light as a feather and as powerful as our huge old Cannon which cost 5 times as much. Yesterday I took some pictures out the window of a vehicle doing about 50 using the telephoto. 5 pictures and not one was blurred. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S

customer_reviews.title: Canon Power Shot SX400
customer_reviews.text: Took 10 days longer to get here than expected. Seller wasn't helpful at all. Didn't come with a memory card and as far as I can tell there is no way to upload your pictures onto your pc. Is comfortable to hold and nice looking. Not what I expected much at all and pretty much a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes great pictures and videos
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and videos! It comes with the camera itself, a lens cap, a battery for the camera and the charger for it. It doesn't come with a cable to export pictures, but you need a simple mini USB cord. Here's a quick slideshow to show you some of the pictures. Thanks for your time! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: The Fam

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this Camera
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Camera! Such a great price for what all it is capable of! It takes WONDERFUL photos! I have a 6 year old and it can be hard to snap pictures of him with him moving and running. I can grab amazing photos of him while he's in his zone.Recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn singleton

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes excellent pictures. The only issue I have is the ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes excellent pictures. The only issue I have is the custom made battery for the camera. I would have standardized batteries. That being said, the battery has an excellent charge, I often take hundreds of pictures on a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Gardocki

customer_reviews.title: Good photos and zoom is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This camera it is like everyone said it, point and shoot. I'm happy with the camera but I wish I could change the setting for pictures which it doesn't have. The only thing so far is the zoom. It is amazing. I wouldn't buy it again because I'm looking for a professional camera which I thought this was something like that. I Would recommended for other people who are electronic savvy.
customer_reviews.author: Hola

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera for a beginner. Easy use and instructions. It takes great pics and video. I will recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Toad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it overall, not always the best quality in low light
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This takes fantastic pictures. It is easy to use and it downloads right to my computer with just a few buttons to push. I just love this camera. I'm posting a picture of my dog that I took about 50-70 feet from her and I zoomed in. It is so clear. I can't say enough about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Up Close Pics! Great Camera, Excellent Price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a blogger, and I purchased this camera primarily for that pirposwepurpose, and I couldn't be happier! This camera gives you great crisp, detailed pics up close- which is great for showing detail- and when I took it up on a hike to the ice caves, I was amazed at the detail from so far away! I haven't tried it out at night yet, but I would definitely recommend this camera as an affordable option for anyone taking up close pics, selling items online like Etsy shop owners, where showing small details is super important!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Neal

customer_reviews.title: ... does not have so many bells and whistles and love love the closeness I can get with the power ...
customer_reviews.text: After researching many cameras I decided on this one because it does not have so many bells and whistles and love love the closeness I can get with the power zoom. Takes great pictures. The battery last a long time as well and recharges rather fast. Biggest disadvantage is the size. My old camera would fit in my pocket, but this one is too bulky. Still I love all the features of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Foil

customer_reviews.title: Looked it over before wraping and everything seemed great. It would have been nice to include the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got it as a gift. Looked it over before wraping and everything seemed great. It would have been nice to include the user's manual instead of the one sheet of basic instructions.I have several top of the line Canon SLRs so I guess I expected a bit more. I'm sure the recipient will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K. Bowden

customer_reviews.title: I am definitely happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely happy with this camera. It has great zoom and great focus. The only thing I saw a problem with was getting a macro shot. It is definitely possible, but would be much easier if you also bought a macro lense though they are fairly expensive (around $60). Here are some pics I took with it, no edits or filters.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! My wife and I used it to capture beautiful images and videos of our week-long trip along the California coast. The zoom is much better than expected and the various features and effects are very easy to use. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nonchalanthippo

customer_reviews.title: SOoFar So Good
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I don't know enough about these things to give it a real review. I can say that it is user friendly. I like the video part, pretty stable. I like the lithium battery. Does not come with USB cord to transfer your pics to computer, but I guess you can always stick memory card in your PC to download pics or for printing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Deck

customer_reviews.title: amazing zoom!!
customer_reviews.text: i got a new camera since buying this .. the zoom on this is ridiculous. fun for lightweight stuff
customer_reviews.author: katalin fodor

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, easy to use, great shots , I should have gotten the memory card for it when I ordered it, but picked one up as soon as I received it , it was my mistake . The price was right also.
customer_reviews.author: Yria

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera! I can't wait to be able to get out and really use it. I'm about as amateur as it gets and even I can take really nice pictures with this. Just think what I could do if I knew what I was doing! ;)
customer_reviews.author: cheryllynn

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera for the value. Take great pictures and easy to use. The only thing that kept me from five stars is it has its own battery so if I'm low I can't switch as easily as I could with a camera that uses AA, but I really like it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Tidus

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this!! The reviews had me a little worried, but it turned out to be an amazing camera. I took a picture of size 12 font from about 20 feet away, and I was able to zoom in and read it no problem. It also takes great pictures in the woods, and it took an excellent family Christmas photo. This camera is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok little camera. I wish I had spent a ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok little camera. I wish I had spent a little more money, and purchased one with an eye piece
customer_reviews.author: Ginger D

customer_reviews.title: Auto focus is horrible
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for me as a gift. Very simple, easy to use camera. However as another reviewer stated, the auto focus is horrible. I was "lucky" to get a good clear shot of anything. If you want an easy point-and-shoot camera, forget it. It ain't happening. I just issued a request for a refund. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: owl tree acres

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for cost
customer_reviews.text: Been using this camera for everything and it's been amazing for photo quality and video. The zoom is even more impressive taking shots from way across to the other mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Sayachy

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first camera I have purchased and I absolutely love it. Growing up in the generation that almost always had cameras on their phone I have never actually owned a camera until this one. I took a trip out to Colorado and decided to purchase this camera for the trip, wow am I glad I did. This camera takes awesome pictures, my iPhone pictures were not doing the scenery justice at all! It a light weight camera so you can easily carry it around with you all day. The photo quality is very nice and the camera itself is super user friendly. I love the look of the camera and the large lenses is great for zooming!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: pretty cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: not what I expected, pretty cheaply made, and pictures are not so great, yellow cast to them when used indoors, without flash, but then if I use the flash it's too bright and the photo is washed out! looking for another one to replace this...just doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: katz

customer_reviews.title: too soon to really judge. I have had a ...
customer_reviews.text: too soon to really judge. I have had a Canon for 5 years and lost it in the ocean. the instruction are hard to follow for me when the other one was so east loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ann

customer_reviews.title: Captures ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera!!! Easy to use!!! Found a camera bag at Amazon that works with it!!! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter camera. I bought it so my whole family could use it. Its simple yet has many features that make it a great camera. I recommend it for anyone wanting something more then just a simple camera
customer_reviews.author: DRL

customer_reviews.title: this was a good camera. user for over a year to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: this was a good camera. user for over a year to keep back in to photography, the eventually upgraded to a pro canon camera. pretty good features great price. overall decent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Norford

customer_reviews.title: Good Video recording for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well. Used mostly the video recording option and thought it did a great job for the price. Used it for recording our church sermons. Thought it did the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Bought it for my daughter and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Bought it for my daughter and she is very very happy with it! Excellent performance, easy to use, stunning pix
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Good for someone just starting out.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. It was a bit smaller than I expected but it is great quality. I would definitely recommend to someone who is just starting out using a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Coy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small and light camera. The lens stretches really far. And the pictures comes out nice and clear. And the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best feature is probably the zoom lens but enjoy the speed with which you can take multiple pictures. Shoots better in low light conditions than my previous camera. Only thing is I have yet to find a shoulder strap to carry the camera around. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Phil Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: great CAM. CON
customer_reviews.text: great CAM . CON : the display screen is low res so you wont really know how the picture came out
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the prouct
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the prouct! I searched for weeks to buy a camera with affordable price. This is very compact and light but not too light to take pictures. If you want wifi connection, you'd better pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Diane in Columbia

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: Lost my old camera. This one is easier to use and takes fantastic photos. Seamless connect to my iMac Easy to carry and thin design makes it fit in a shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Carver

customer_reviews.title: The image quality is also bad. It is actually a good camera for beginners ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera comes so small, not what I expected. The image quality is also bad. It is actually a good camera for beginners but I don't like the quality of the pictures it takes. The settings are quite difficult to get used to with but it won't be much of a problem. Not what I expected. This was my very first own camera, but I'm disappointed​.
customer_reviews.author: Shivam Patel

customer_reviews.title: That i can use it. I have others but they are soo complicated that i give up.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camara that i have ever own .simple to use.very dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Mona salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera but not what I expected or what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera but not what I expected or what I need. I just gave it to a friend who is thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures, easy handling
customer_reviews.text: All the whistles and bells the products claims to perform have been confirmed functional. Great pictures, easy handling, connectivity, value for money I bet. I got it also for a better price here on Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: hardDRIVE

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of the picture view
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the picture view. My only concern is that the battery did not last that long and must be recharged. This is not as convenient as having back up batteries to insert. Guess I miss this in reading the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Ann R

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera..great close ups from a distance..no blurry photos. Has lens cover. The seller promised extra things for good review..they have not responded to my emails. But, I do love the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: I'm completely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat of a amateur photographer and I have some expensive camera equipment, but this unit is so handy for the purpose for which I bought it, having pictures to post on email, I'm completely happy with it. The picture quality is what you would expect from a $140 camera, but that's just fine for posting email. I'm real happy with my purchase. They did advertise a 32 meg secure digital card, but I didn't get that. They said it might be sent separately so I'm still waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin L. Nunley

customer_reviews.title: Takes awesome pictures. The pictures are very clear and colors ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes awesome pictures. The pictures are very clear and colors are vivid. Pictures look like their from an expensive camera and it was easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Biggest piece of crap I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of crap I ever bought. Bought for my daughter to take on her vacation. Worked for 2 pictures then battery died. Bought a replacement battery and battery charger. Same thing. Does not work at all. Wish I had returned it. Bought a new camera instead. I usually have luck with Canon so I'm thinking it was the seller selling me a piece of junk. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera. The quality of the photos are not all that great. My iPhone takes better pictures. This is great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera, but the zoom is great!
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok camera...I bought it for the zoom and the zoom is great...takes a great close up shot at about 100 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great base model to start with
customer_reviews.text: Gave this camera as gift to my daughter. She is enjoying the camera. Great base model to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Jason O.

customer_reviews.title: but it takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.text: My first 'no film' camera; it's still hard to understand, but it takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Easy, Clear
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera. Convenient and easy to use. Would like an automatic flash. Pictures come out nice and clear. Plan on using it a lot this summer for grandchildren recitals and my daughter wedding events!
customer_reviews.author: L. McManus

customer_reviews.title: I am not a professional photographer but with my basic like of requirements like taking a snap in the dark ...
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this for 8 months now. I am not a professional photographer but with my basic like of requirements like taking a snap in the dark or taking photos in a rainy gloomy day , this camera had worked perfectly well to me giving me good quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Brutus

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Easy to use and takes great photos and videos. Also like the rechargeable battery! Last a long time. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, shitty durability
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked super well! Great video quality and the zoom definition is insane. However, the battery doesn't sink in properly and after only a few months of using this product, my camera does not turn on anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The camera only takes good picture if the subject is stiff as a board and completely unmoving. They come out blurry and it's the biggest pain in the ass. Now my camera takes blurry photos even when no one is moving.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. I did not want to drop a lot of money, and after doing some research I picked this. You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: George Selph

customer_reviews.title: the recipient used it a few times and claims her camera phone takes better pictures. Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, the recipient used it a few times and claims her camera phone takes better pictures. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. Lytwyn

customer_reviews.title: Greatest camera ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera ever! I am not a photographer. I needed something that was a point and shoot, no messing around with settings, camera. The zoom on this is CRAZY! Everyone I know on FB wants to buy this! Seriously, if you want to take great pictures, without having to think about it, this is the camera you need! I bought a case for it that works great. So easy to use and understand. You can also go into settings and do them yourself, but I'm not that savvy. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera for a beginner, simple to use and takes great pics
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very nice, it replaced one eborrowed from a friend that didn't end up in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: sharon rygwelski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: The reviews that it was simple to use are right! Perfect for me, since I am not very tech savvy. To turn the flash on, you lift the flash. Super easy and takes great pics!
customer_reviews.author: Lavinia Creswa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better options out there. Zoom feature is barely used by me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mcleod

customer_reviews.title: This camera is SO GOOD! I am very impressed with the zoom option
customer_reviews.text: This camera is SO GOOD! I am very impressed with the zoom option. This picture was taken from about 120 feet away (just as a test.)
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Molina

customer_reviews.title: slow to process and save pic, starter camera for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: not a fast camera.. its a starter camera. works ok for daily use, dont expect to get pro quality pic as it takes long to process pics.
customer_reviews.author: pro review

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful point and shoot camera. I ordered this to take on vacation and the pictures came out wonderful. Even zooming the pictures are still sharp.
customer_reviews.author: mommy876

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes great pictures and the 30X zoom lens means you do ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and the 30X zoom lens means you do not have to be right on top of your subject. On my last family get together, I was able to take close ups of family members easily. People do not stop and stand still for pictures often, and I got them all with this camera from far away.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's a good camera. I thought it will not do a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good camera. I thought it will not do a good job because of the size but then it exceeded my expectations. It's handy and very convenient. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SX400 Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:BaseWith the Canon Power Shot SX400 IS digital camera, you can give yourself the power to really zoom quickly and easily. The advanced yet simple-to-use SX400 IS gets you up close from virtually anywhere with a 30x optical zoom and 24mm wide-angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer. Give your images and video what they've been missing. Zoom in on your child's face in a crowd, capture action from up in the stands, or a pet's most playful moments. In addition to this impressive versatility the SX400 IS offers incredible Canon image quality with a 16 megapixel sensor and the Canon DIGIC 4+ image processor for richly detailed, brilliant images and true-to-life 720p HD video. The camera makes it easy to get your best shot every time, with Intelligent IS for shake-free images, High Speed AF for effortless shooting, and Smart AUTO that automatically chooses the proper camera settings for the shooting situation. Smart, easy, incredibly versatile, Power Shot SX400 IS delivers it all.
feature_bullets: 16.0 Megapixel sensor combined with the Canon DIGIC 4+ Image Processor
Capture impressive 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button and zoom while shooting
High Speed AF greatly helps improve focus speed
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings for the camera based on predefined shooting situations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars661 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
